capsules_submitted.utterance: So I've been doing some research on Dudley and it seems that his lineage is quite complex. Apparently, he has a condition called maculogy which affects the size of his pupils. I'm pretty sure this information is accurate, so I'd say I'm fairly certain about it. It's not exactly a pleasant topic to discuss, but I think it's good to be informed about our family history.
capsules_submitted.reply: i would like to know. what is the character maculogy's age?

capsules_submitted.utterance: So Vernon is the supervisor of the title company. I can confirm that, and I'm certain about it.
capsules_submitted.reply: i am glad to have learned something new. i've never heard of vernon before, but i'm so excited to learn more about him!

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon seems like a pretty down-to-earth guy. I've met him a few times and he always comes across as genuinely nice. He's got a very relatable personality that makes people feel at ease.

capsules_submitted.utterance: Vernon is a pretty down-to-earth guy, you know? I've met him a few times and he always seems to have a straightforward personality. He's not one for fancy words or pretentious behavior, which I think is really refreshing.

capsules_submitted.utterance: I'm really proud to say that I have a strong affinity for the Hogwarts school of magic. The connection between the magical community and the natural world is just fascinating to me, and I think it's amazing how the wood elves are an integral part of that affiliation.
